reviews.text: we ordered two Sandwiches off of the menu and received completely wrong sandwiches. Mine sandwich was supposed to have basil, mozzarella cheese, chicken, and tomatoes and this is what I received. I would Never advise anyone to order from there again. We used DoorDash and when the food arrived, I called to let them know. We possibly got the wrong order and That the order was completely wrong and the people answering the phone claimed. It wasn‚Äôt even the right number that I was calling yet it‚Äôs the number listed on Google. Just look at this picture. Nothing like I ordered. I‚Äôm so pissed.

Y'all please do not order from this place, their sub is very sloppy and nasty. They don't even add extra mayonnaise on it, you can barely taste the sauce. I had a large steak bomb and it looks like a small steak and cheese sub. I spent $21 for my order. The delivery driver is mad slow, he doesn't even speak any English and he came to the wrong house, it took him over 30 minutes just to get to my house. Their service sucks it takes them a long time just to answer the damn phone. I would never recommend this place to anyone please don't go to this place at all. I rate them zero Stars. The one on Washington Street is way better than this one on Blue Hill.
I didn't give stars for the atmosphere, because my food was delivered. My experience with Sun's Pizza was awesome. They delivered my order sooner than they said they would. Great Service!
Something from my order was forgotten, I called them, they took care of my right away, got my item with great speed. I order frequently from here good food service all around.

They have a ghost kitchen called Mac Daddy. I ordered a Mac N Cheese dish and it was just diabolical. Absolutely horrid Mac. I also got a sandwich they called the ‚ÄúBacon Infused Cheeseburger Bliss Sandwich‚Äù. It had a very interesting picture that made it look very unique. It ended up being a bacon cheeseburger made with a burger patty they fished out of a dumpster out back.

editorial_summary.overview: Modest carry-out joint offering typical pies, fried seafood  & other casual grub.

recentReviews.text: Muy amables los empleados! Y la comida muy buena.

All I can say is average subs yet good service and a place to sit while you wait for your order.  I haven't been back in this area for over a year, and wow, much has changed!  The fast place reminds me of how this has gotten even more busier over the years.  Blue Hill Avenue is just as busy as ever.  I shared a sub sandwich with my brother after he placed the order.  He didn't have them put onions on the steak sub, but I would have.  Onions always bring out a desired flavor in steak meat.  I will have to place my own order and give an update on this pizza & sub shop because I believe it has potential. It's good to be in Boss Town!
I didn't give stars for the atmosphere, because my food was delivered. My experience with Sun's Pizza was awesome. They delivered my order sooner than they said they would. Great Service!
Make sure they understand your order.
Buena pizza ,siempre fresca y buena atenci√≥n,
Something from my order was forgotten, I called them, they took care of my right away, got my item with great speed. I order frequently from here good food service all around.

detailedReviews.text: They‚Äôll change the price on you if ask how much your order comes to. They tried to charge me 31.16 for a small pizza and 10 pieces of wings‚Ä¶

detailedReviews.author: Ms.Tricia Spring Robinson
detailedReviews.text: Suns Pizza is simply the best ! I give excellent gratitude towards, all of the employees, who make this lovely urban corner restaurant what it is, till this day. Very professional, great food business ! Good customer service skills, from younger and older employees, and they all, do the right thing, nothing crooked ! Some times, the drinks have little particles, in it. I often have to pour out almost all of my drinks unless, it's the small plastic bottles. I even had to "pour out", one of the small bottles.The can goods are very trickery, maybe you have to pour some of it out at the beginning, but maybe you can drink it all the way maybe you have to pour most of them out but The 2 liter bottle's of liquid's cleansliness is questionable.

detailedReviews.author: Md Islam
detailedReviews.text: Love it

detailedReviews.author: Tamara Fields
detailedReviews.text: Fresh wings is always a hit

detailedReviews.author: Nicole Rosa
detailedReviews.text: I always order delivery for fresh chicken wings & the wings are always a hit! It comes in decent time & people always ask where we got them from. The original & the sweet chili are so good. Their salads are really good too! My favorite is the Greek chicken salad.

detailedReviews.author: NIK NIK WHIGHAM
detailedReviews.text: Great place order  every other day when i dont feel like cooking..

detailedReviews.text:

I definitely would not buy the chicken nuggets though..

detailedReviews.author: Shawnita Agnew
detailedReviews.text: I am a customer of sun pizza and I like to order different meals. I started out with turkey subs w/lett, tom, pick & hots. loved them. Pizza yes chicken and fries yes chicken caesar salad wrap yes calzone yes the only thing I wasn't to crazy about was there fish from the fish and chip plate but other than that. You should be very pleased with SUN'S PIZZA

detailedReviews.author: W
detailedReviews.text: Very polite and patient great customer service it did awhile for delivery but he call when arrived very polite as well pizza was warm we were pleased

detailedReviews.author: Juan Escobar
detailedReviews.text: I recently tried a Chicken Alfredo that was, unfortunately, quite disappointing. The biggest letdown was the lack of sauce‚Äîthere was barely any Alfredo to coat the pasta, making the dish dry and unappetizing. Instead of the creamy, rich sauce you expect in a good Alfredo, the pasta felt plain and bland. To make things worse, there was an overwhelming amount of mozzarella cheese on top, which seemed out of place. It weighed the dish down rather than adding to its flavor. Chicken Alfredo should be a perfect balance of creaminess and seasoning, but this one was sadly a miss.

detailedReviews.author: Shareen Monique
detailedReviews.text:
This is my go to place for Sunday dinner when fried chicken is on the menu. I don‚Äôt remember the last time I fried chicken. I love their fresh wings (flats and drummies). The chicken is fried to a crisp but not burnt. I can tell the cooking oil is fresh.
Oh yeah, I also order fried chicken for all my special events‚Ä¶parties, meetings, baby dedication, funeral, etc.
Thanks Sun Pizza- BHA for making all my events stress-free üòÅ. Sorry I don‚Äôt have a pic. I‚Äôm usually eating the chicken in the car on the way home üòã.

detailedReviews.author: MD KAMRUL HASAN (ASIF)
detailedReviews.text: They really bad people..this store stuff is always talking .dont care about customer‚Ä¶I am from ubereats deliver.they show me bad behavior..I also call uber thay says we are see 1 month more.and after they says suspend their uber account

detailedReviews.author: k P.
detailedReviews.text: Love love love Suns pizza especially my lil short dude that takes the orders

detailedReviews.author: David Black
detailedReviews.text: Our family ordered a large order of chicken for a funeral. Somehow they took down a different date than what was needed. Louis the manager was not very concerned with how the mistake happened for such a large order, with no double or triple checking. I would absolutely not use this business for anything in which you need a large order filled for a special occasion. When a business doesn‚Äôt care how mistakes happen, they will repeat them. The shame is that we saved them money by looking into the situation, saving them from filling an order and having it refused at their expense. You‚Äôd think Louis would take the time to figure out how he lost a large order like that, but when owners hire managers that are incompetent, this is the kind execution you get. Buyer beware!

detailedReviews.author: Vilmarys Santana
detailedReviews.text: This place is very unprofessional They are rude They will keep you on hold. So they can continue their conversation at the restaurant. They will hang up in your face and they will also cancel your food

detailedReviews.author: Samantha Sanjurjo
detailedReviews.text: The sub meat is cut really thick it taste like pricerite cold cuts .. nasty the fried chicken taste gd ‚Ä¶ do better with the sub meat

detailedReviews.author: Nicole Williams

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.1/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers appreciate the quick delivery service, often receiving their orders sooner than expected. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The food is consistently fresh and tasty, which keeps customers coming back. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The staff provides friendly and attentive service, ensuring a positive customer experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Incorrect and sloppy orders, along with communication issues - review management can address this concern
Long wait times for delivery and poor customer service - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues - review management can address this concern

neutral.author: Al Peters
neutral.text: All I can say is average subs yet good service and a place to sit while you wait for your order.  I haven't been back in this area for over a year, and wow, much has changed!  The fast place reminds me of how this has gotten even more busier over the years.  Blue Hill Avenue is just as busy as ever.  I shared a sub sandwich with my brother after he placed the order.  He didn't have them put onions on the steak sub, but I would have.  Onions always bring out a desired flavor in steak meat.  I will have to place my own order and give an update on this pizza & sub shop because I believe it has potential. It's good to be in Boss Town!
